amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for various ACORN and Community Organizations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used for various ACORN and Community Organizations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A044) Agreed to by recorded vote: 251 - 168, 1 Present (Roll no. 397).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
